column1: On [[5 March]] [[1959]], [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] wrote '''[[Letters not published in "The Letters of J.R.R. Tolkien"
column6: articlename=J.R.R. Tolkien Collection: Other Tolkien Writings, 1911-1976

column1: *'''Subject:''' Gratitude for Ready's arrangement of the purchase by the [[Marquette University]] of Tolkien's manuscripts for ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]''.<ref name=CG/><ref name=Marq/>
*'''Publication:''' A description of and quotations from the letter appeared in ''[[The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide
column2: The J.R.R. Tolkien Companion and Guide: Chronology]]''.
[Having received a copy of Ready's novel ''[[List of books in Tolkien's library#The Poor Hater
column3: The Poor Hater]]'' just before his collapse, he hopes] to recover sufficient concentration soon to be able to read it, among other things
